title: Imitations of Horace - relationship between lines

content.prompt: The relationship between lines 1–8 and lines 9–14 is best described by which of the following?

choices.label: Lines 1–8 present a description; lines 9–14 present a contrasting description.
Lines 1–8 present a rule; lines 9–14 describe an exception to it.
Lines 1–8 pose a question; lines 9–14 answer it.
Lines 1–8 begin a narrative; lines 9–14 embellish it.

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain the function of contrasts within a text.
